parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Adjective - Vocative Masculine Singular
str2: Evil, bad, wicked, malicious, slothful.

parse: Noun - Vocative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) (as adj.) enslaved, (b) (as noun) a (male) slave. From deo; a slave.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Preposition
str2: From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Noun - Genitive Neuter Singular
str2: The mouth, speech, eloquence in speech, the point of a sword.

parse: Verb - Pluperfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To know, remember, appreciate.

parse: Conjunction
str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Adjective - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Grim, severe, strict, exacting, harsh, rigid. From a derivative of the same as aer; rough, i.e. severe.

parse: Noun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To raise, lift up, take away, remove.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To put, place, lay, set, fix, establish. A prolonged form of a primary theo to place.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To reap, gather, harvest. From theros; to harvest.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To sow, spread, scatter. Probably strengthened from spao; to scatter, i.e. Sow.
